title: Chapter 327
body:
Chapter 327

327 The person at the bottom of the blood pool

“As expected, it’s in the depths of the mo family.”

...

Lu Ming’s expression changed.

The mo family mansion was built in layers and layers, with countless palaces.

The two of them walked around for half an hour before they arrived at a dilapidated stone house.

In front of the stone house, the head of the mo family and a few white-haired old men had already arrived.

haha, mo Ying, Lu shaoxia, you’re here. The place where our ancestors left their inheritance is under this stone house. You can go in when we open the door.

The head of the mo family smiled.

Lu Ming and Mo Ying nodded.

“Let’s start!”

The head of the mo family nodded to the elders.

The old men moved and spread out around the stone house. They shot out beams of light into the stone house.

The stone house began to tremble slightly, emitting rays of light.

The stone house was covered in inscriptions.

The inscriptions were bright, and with a few shouts from the elders, a stone door in front of the stone house suddenly opened.

The moment the door of the stone house opened, Lu Ming seemed to see a blood-colored ocean surging toward him. The nine Dragon bloodline seemed to be so excited that it was about to roar at the sky.

“This place is not simple!”

Lu Ming frowned slightly.

Mo Ying didn’t seem to feel anything unusual, and she looked at the stone house with anticipation.

alright, moying, young master Lu, the stone door is open. You can go in!

The head of the mo family said.

“Many thanks to the patriarch and the elders!”

Mo Ying sincerely thanked the mo family head and the elders, then stood up and walked towards the stone house.

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered and he followed mo Ying in.

After the two of them walked in, the stone door of the stone house automatically closed.

hahaha, great things have come to pass. This time, my mo family will have made a great contribution.

After the stone door closed, the head of the mo family laughed excitedly. However, his smile did not have the slightest bit of kindness. Instead, it seemed a little ferocious.

In the stone house.

After the stone door was closed, the stone house was not dark. The walls of the stone house were inlaid with luminous stones.

There was a big hole on the floor of the stone house, and a stone ladder slanted down the big Hole.

The head of the mo family had told them that the inheritance of the mo family’s ancestors was deep underground.

The two of them did not hesitate and walked down the stairs.

The stairs were very long, and they kept going down. After walking for about a thousand meters, they saw a stone door. The stone door was flowing with inscriptions, and it was bright and colorful.

In the middle of the stone door, there was a pit.

Mo Ying took out a Jade tablet and shone it into the pit.

Kachaa!

Immediately, the stone door made a creaking sound and opened automatically.

Behind the stone door, there was another stone ladder that went down. The stone ladder was getting more and more steep, almost vertical.

After walking for a while, they saw another stone door. Mo Ying did the same thing and opened it with a Jade card.

This time, there was a passage behind the stone door.

On both sides of the passage, there were stone rooms.

Lu Ming furrowed his brows slightly. He could sense a chilly aura from the stone rooms.

“How can this place be so eerie?”

Obviously, mo Ying had also felt it and said with a slight frown.

perhaps it’s because no one has been here for too many years.

Lu Ming said.

Mo Ying nodded and didn’t say anything. The two of them continued walking.

After walking for a while, the stone chamber disappeared, and the passage continued forward.

After walking for about a thousand meters, they reached the end of the tunnel. In front of them, there was a huge underground cave.

In the cave, the cold Yin Qi was even thicker.

In the middle of the cave, there was a huge pool.

The two of them were stunned when they saw the pool.

This pool was not filled with water at all, but bright red blood.

That’s right, the entire pool was filled with blood, and the smell of blood filled the entire underground cave.

“This … What was this? Could this be the ancestor’s inheritance?”

Mo Ying said in shock and disbelief.

Hualala!

At this moment, the blood in the pool churned violently. Then, the blood gushed into the air and actually condensed into two blood-colored Dragons, which pounced at Lu Ming and Mo Ying.

Roar!

The two blood-colored flood Dragons roared, and the smell of blood assailed their nostrils. The flood dragon’s claws were as sharp as knives as they clawed at the two people.

“Not good!”

Lu Ming’s expression changed. The demon subduing spear appeared and he thrust it forward.

Chi Chi!

Two spearlights burst out and shattered the two Blood Dragons.

Roar! Roar!

However, the water in the pond churned and the blood water in the pond condensed into eight blood-colored Dragons.

Eight blood-colored flood Dragons pounced toward the two of them.

“How did this happen?”

At this moment, mo Ying finally reacted. She waved her hands to resist the blood-red Dragon.

Lu Ming’s long spear trembled and he thrust it forward, crushing the blood-colored flood Dragons one by one.

However, these blood-colored flood Dragons were not destroyed. They gathered together in the air and formed another blood-colored flood Dragon. At the same time, more blood-colored flood Dragons continued to form in the pool and pounced at Lu Ming and Mo Ying.

There was no way to kill them all.

In a short while, mo Ying was scratched by a blood-red dragon’s claw, leaving a deep wound.

BOOM!

The aura on Lu Ming’s body exploded violently. He swept his long spear out and dozens of blood-colored flood Dragons exploded in the air.

However, it was useless. After a while, it would reform.

“Since I can’t kill it, I’ll just destroy this blood pool!”

Lu Ming strode forward, intending to blow up the pool full of blood.

Clang! Clang!

At this moment, the sound of metal clashing could be heard from the blood pool. It sounded like iron chains were colliding with each other.

Clang clang clang …

The sound of the collision became louder, and the blood in the pool of blood surged more violently, making a loud noise like a stormy sea.

Roar! “Roar!”

The blood-colored flood Dragons roared repeatedly. They stopped attacking Lu Ming and Mo Ying and flew back into the blood pool.

BOOM!

Under the pool of blood, a violent explosion suddenly sounded. The entire underground cave shook violently, as if there was a prehistoric giant beast in the pool that was about to break free.

“I’m not willing!”

Suddenly, a loud roar came from the bottom of the blood pool.

Lu Ming and Mo Ying’s expressions changed drastically. There was actually someone at the bottom of the blood pool.

“I can’t accept this! The Dark Moon royal family is despicable and shameless! The entire mo family is despicable and shameless! You’ve set me up! I won’t let you off even if I become a ghost!”

A loud roar came from the blood pool. The voice was filled with pain and unwillingness, as well as hatred.

Clang, clang …

The sound of the chains clanging became even more intense. The next moment, the blood pool suddenly churned violently. As the blood churned, it actually formed the shape of a human.

This humanoid figure was dozens of meters tall and extremely huge. It looked like a burly old man. He roared at the sky and tried to break free, but the endless blood around him wrapped him up.

Roar!

With an earth-shaking roar, the endless blood water condensed into a hundred-meter-long giant flood Dragon, which wrapped around the old man’s body.
